entry.title: because i knew you
entry.summary:
Author: coveylace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,682Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: “If you go through with this, take off the cape and put on a pair of stethoscopes instead, I think it would be the first time in a long time that everyone in the family would agree on something.” “And that would be?” He smiles something rueful, then. A look displaced in time and space. Locked somewhere Damian cannot reach. “No more dead Robins.” or, the one where damian volunteers for the white butterfly project, a parisian-run charity organization, and things fall into place from there.
